title: Geisha cupcakes
description: Decorated with geisha faces made from fondant icing, Gok Wan's stylish banana and nut cupcakes are sure to impress.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a black edible ink pen.
ingredients: 4 very ripe bananas, peeled and mashed
1 large packet ready-to-roll skin tone fondant icing
1 large packet ready-to-roll black fondant icing
